revision.text:
The following text colors are supported: {| {{prettytable}} !ZScript/ACS constant!!code!!colspan="2"|color!!Zscript/ACS Constant!!code!!colspan="2"|color |- |{{c|CR_BRICK}}||a||{{color|#CC3333}}||reddish brick||{{c|CR_LIGHTBLUE}}||n||{{color|#33EEFF}}||light blue |- |{{c|CR_TAN}}||b||{{color|#D2B48C}}||tan||{{c|CR_CREAM}}||o||{{color|#FFCC99}}||cream |- |{{c|CR_GREY}} or {{c|CR_GRAY}}||c||{{color|#CCCCCC}}||gray||{{c|CR_OLIVE}}||p||{{color|#D1D8A8}}||olive |- |{{c|CR_GREEN}}||d||{{color|#00CC00}}||green||{{c|CR_DARKGREEN}}||q||{{color|#008C00}}||dark green |- |{{c|CR_BROWN}}||e||{{color|#996633}}||brown||{{c|CR_DARKRED}}||r||{{color|#800000}}||dark red |- |{{c|CR_GOLD}}||f||{{color|#FFCC00}}||gold||{{c|CR_DARKBROWN}}||s||{{color|#663333}}||dark brown |- |{{c|CR_RED}}||g||{{color|#FF5566}}||red||{{c|CR_PURPLE}}||t||{{color|#9966CC}}||purple |- |{{c|CR_BLUE}}||h||{{color|#9999FF}}||blue||{{c|CR_DARKGRAY}}||u||{{color|#808080}}||dark gray |- |{{c|CR_ORANGE}}||i||{{color|#FFAA00}}||orange||{{c|CR_CYAN}}||v||{{color|#00DDDD}}||cyan |- |{{c|CR_WHITE}}||j||{{color|#DFDFDF}}||white||{{c|CR_ICE}}||w||{{color|#7C7C98}}||ice |- |{{c|CR_YELLOW}}||k||{{color|#EEEE33}}||yellow||{{c|CR_FIRE}}||x||{{color|#D57604}}||fire |- |{{c|CR_UNTRANSLATED}}||l|| ||use original colors||{{c|CR_SAPPHIRE}}||y||{{color|#506CFC}}||sapphire |- |{{c|CR_BLACK}}||m||{{color|#000000}}||black||{{c|CR_TEAL}}||z||{{color|#236773}}||teal |- | || -|| ||{{CVAR|M|msgmidcolor|Default color}} for [[Print]] messages|| || *|| ||{{CVAR|M|msg3color|Default color}} for chat messages |- | || +|| ||{{CVAR|M|msgmidcolor2|Default color}} for [[PrintBold]] messages|| ||!|| ||{{CVAR|M|msg4color|Default color}} for team chat messages |}
